plot: A young musician Long is asked to compose music for a local Dragon Boat Festival. There he finds new love and understanding of his cultural background.
title: Sai Long duo jin
plot_es: A young musician Long is asked to compose music for a local Dragon Boat Festival. There he finds new love and understanding of his cultural background.
plot_en: A young musician Long is asked to compose music for a local Dragon Boat Festival. There he finds new love and understanding of his cultural background.
